meanings.definition: The female reproductive organ in certain algae and fungi.
meanings.sent1: The carpogonia of the algae help in reproduction.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the carpogonia of fungi to understand their reproductive process.
meanings.sent3: The carpogonia of the algae threw a party to celebrate their successful reproduction.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like carpogonia, spreading new ideas everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The carpogonia danced gracefully, symbolizing the beauty of nature's reproduction.
